articles.description: Leeds Rhinos loose forward and captain Stevie Ward is a two-time Grand Final winner with the club but still suffers symptoms from the concussions he suffered in January and February last year.
articles.content:
Today I announce my retirement from rugby league due to the two concussions I suffered on the 19th January and 2nd February 2020.
